root: ^"Noooo- my precious collect...." - the demoness howls as the black fog around her darkens, appearing to pull her into a fiery pit appearing just below her hooves.
^A sharp fingered claw lashes out at the dirt, nails leaving deep trails before she disappears entirely.
^"That was... I pray Rae's mercy will not be able to reach her... where-ever she went."

c-1: ^The large iron gate in front of you suddenly swings open, greeting you with a burst of hollow laughter. "One favor deserves another...".
